remarks: First-order logic and set theory.  (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
bnj982.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
bnj982.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
bnj982.3 $e |- ( ch -> A. x ch ) $.
bnj982.4 $e |- ( th -> A. x th ) $.
bnj982 $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps /\ ch /\ th ) -> A. x ( ph /\ ps /\ ch /\ th ) ) $.
